sentences.en: He devoted the entirety of his life to medical research.
sentences.cn: 他把毕生精力贡献给医学研究工作.

sentences.en: He spent the entirety of his life composing music.
It is also of subjectiveness, entirety and relative stability.
sentences.cn: 它有主观性 、 整体性和相对稳定性.

sentences.en: Link to full text - read this in its entirety.
sentences.cn: 连接到完整的文本 - 完整阅读.

sentences.en: Listening to it in its entirety is also fairly unrewarding.
sentences.cn: 把它完整地听下来后还是没多少收获。

sentences.en: Ownership has been described as " the entirety of powers of use and disposal allowed by law ".
sentences.cn: 所有权被称作是 “ 法定使用权和处置权的集合体. ”

sentences.en: The agricultural surplus was taken over almost in its entirety by the ruler.
sentences.cn: 剩余农产品几乎全被统治者囊括一空.

sentences.en: The film has been shown in its entirety for the first time.
sentences.cn: 这部电影是第一次完整地放映。

sentences.en: The Lead - Rubber - Bearing ( LRB ) is a type of isolation device in its entirety.
sentences.cn: 铅销橡胶支座是整体型减隔震装置的一种.

sentences.en: the poem is too long to quote in its entirety here.
sentences.cn: 那首诗太长，无法在此全篇引用。

sentences.en: The poem is too long to quote in its entirety.
sentences.cn: 这首诗太长,没法全文引用.

sentences.en: This is a combined offer, which must be accepted in its entirety.
sentences.cn: 此系搭配报盘, 必须一起接受.

sentences.en: To appreciate the symphony, one must listen to it in its entirety.
sentences.cn: 要欣赏交响乐, 必须听完整的作品.

sentences.en: We must examine the problem in its entirety , ie as a whole , not in parts only.
sentences.cn: 我们要全面地研究这个问题.

sentences.en: We must view the problem in its entirety.
sentences.cn: 我们必须全面地看这个问题.

sentences.en: We rarely remember the entirety of the plot ( Anthony Burgess )
sentences.cn: 我们很少能记清全部情节 ( 安东尼伯吉斯 )

sentences.en: We stayed in the hotel throughout the entirety of the weekend.
sentences.cn: 我们整个周末都待在酒店里。

sentences.en: You must examine the matter in its entirety.
sentences.cn: 你应该全面地看这件事.

phrases.tran_cn: 作为整体；整个地，全面地
